title: API Gateway Lambda Authorizer for Basic HTTP Authentication
description: This pattern deploys an API Gateway REST API protected by a Lambda Authorizer supporting Basic HTTP Authentication

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The Lambda authorizer decodes the credentials provided in the Authorization header. If matched in the mock database a policy is returned giving permissions to invoke the downstream Lambda function. If the user is not found a policy is returned denying access to the downstream Lambda function.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
